attributes.action: Increase the time for testing SATS KS2 to more than 1 week
attributes.additional_details: KS2 SATS why test this all in the space of 1 week?  Why not provide schools with a longer timeframe to complete KS2 tests.  Children are sitting exams in the morning and afternoon and are exhausted by the end of the week.  The results are likely to be impacted and skewed due to this.  We don't put them through this at GCSE or A Level why do we do it for KS2?
